name: builtnoble/vite-php
description: Use Vite with PHP templating engines like Twig, Plates, and Laminas View.

scripts-descriptions.analyze: Run PHPStan static analysis without Xdebug note.
scripts-descriptions.analyze:extension: Run PHPStan for debugging custom PHPStan extensions.
scripts-descriptions.test: Run the test suite with Pest.
scripts-descriptions.test:coverage: Run the test suite and generate a code coverage report, requiring at least 89% coverage.
scripts-descriptions.test:dirty: Run only the tests affected by recent changes.
scripts-descriptions.test:mutate: Run mutation testing to evaluate test effectiveness.
scripts-descriptions.test:type-coverage: Check the type coverage of the codebase, requiring at least 80% coverage.
